original_title: 監禁逃亡 淫らな呪い
overview: The demon of a woman living in a mirror wants the blood of the beautiful woman to live in the world. Before life and model club's president, a famous photographer, the excellent producer who still intertwine the body with the woman. The sacrifice to a demon was prepared for by these three men, and disappearance, the rape murder cases of the model occurred frequently. The mysterious death of the older sister who was a model. The younger sister who belonged to the model club same as an older sister to find out a criminal. She who had the beginning of the case in her hand before long for the murder program of three people….
title: Escape Captivity Obscene Curse
